text: Daviz Mbepo Simango (7 February 1964 â€“ 22 February 2021) was a Mozambican politician and environmentalist. He was Mayor of Beira from 2003 until his death. He was also the President of the Democratic Movement of Mozambique (MDM). Simango was born in Tanganyika. Simango died on 22 February 2021, fifteen days after his 57th birthday at a South African hospital. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Mozambican politicians Category:Mayors Category:Environmentalists
title: Daviz Simango
